text: Joe Biden is a good man and a great Vice President. В Serving alongside him in the Senate and then the administration, I saw first-hand his passion for our country and our people. В Like millions of others, I admire his devotion to family, his grace in grief, his grit and determination on behalf of the middle class, and his unyielding faith in America's promise. В As Vice President, Joe has been by President Obama's side for every pivotal decision. В He helped save the auto industry and pull our economy back from the brink of depression. В He continues to fight for higher wages, safer communities, and a more peaceful world. В It's a record to be proud of, defend, and build on. В And I am confident that history isn't finished with Joe Biden. В As he said today, there is more work to do. В And if I know Joe, he will always be on the front-lines, always fighting for all of us.
title: Hillary Clinton Statement on Vice President Biden
